name: Brenna Beauclair
text: My pizza where prefect, even though you guys had a busy night. Sorry about the rude and inpatient customer. You all did great. My pizza was on time and prefect. Thankx again. 5/7/20 the one on 21st in Topeka

name: Megan Oâ€™Brien
text: We love this pizza, we frequent other locations... I stopped here this time because it was on my way. I won't be stopping here ever again. After having to wait to order I was rushed along. I asked for a pepperoni pizza, just a boring â€¦More

name: Michelle Hubler
text: They are really speedy. Also, the best supreme in town. THEY ARE CLOSED NOW!!

name: Matthew Chenoweth
text: Nothing was ready waited about 20 minutes usually pretty good about that though.

name: R. Mark
text: While being pretty busy, they still managed to get our pizza out quickly, and accurately. Tasty, too!

name: Brandon Bower
text: I had a great experience at Little Ceasars, I was there for the Crazy Happened Promotion. It was alittle busier than I thought it would be but I was patient. I waited in line for about 30-35 but it was well worth it. The staff were very â€¦More

name: Ny Jasper
text: Nice and friendly, good customer service and great quality food

name: Jaiden Itiss
text: My fiancÃ© and I came to this place as soon as we got to Topeka Kansas from Houston for bussiness purposes. We were hungry,tired. There was no wait. The bread sticks were dry no butter no cheese disgusting. Pizza was reheated. Their store â€¦More

name: BACKDOORSALE
text: I love Little Ceasars!  Just wish this restaurant was a little closer to home!

name: Mary Lou
text: Best employees ever great on time best pizza nice price bread sticks best cheese bread are the best and Tara , Wesely , Aliciana , Hannah Are the best helpers ever when us people can't explain what we want the right way over All Rate 5 Thanks Guys .

name: Devon Griffith
text: Friendly helpful service every time, called ahead multiple times and perfect timing on their part every time. Couldn't ask for a better location!

name: Tara Dickerson
text: Great service, nice staff, good quality pizza, best pizza place in town by far.

name: Guera Guera
text: They need to work on their customer service. Stood there for 5 minutes waiting while everyone was staring at me. Lost my business sense this is the second time that has happened.

name: Nick Newberry
text: It's cheap pizza carryout only no in-store dining, but it is quick and easy

name: Solomon Smallback
text: Food is average/what you'd expect from Little Caesar's. The wait time was a lot longer than expected and the lobby kind of felt dingy.

name: Lou Stubby
text: Great service, great pizza, great price. 8.50 with tax for a deep dish pep.

name: C Smith
text: Hot, fresh, and if you do have to wait is is usually very short.

name: Clifford F
text: Quick but the pizza wasn't exactly "hot". Still good though.

name: Evelyn Lizzeth
text: i would give this 0 starz because the guy with glases gave me awful service . waited 30 mins for 2 peporoni pizzas and some wings .

name: Kyle&April Stiles
text: Food great max  and 10min wait

name: Jackie M
text: Hot and tasty for 5 bucks

name: LeANDro
text: The Little Caesars near my house is horrible. They need to manage peak business hours better. Even on a slow day they never have Hot and Readys. Your average wait time is 10 minutes and that is sad cause thats the business Hot and Readys (Little Caesars on Burlingame in Topeka KS) Horrible!

name: Nikki Krutz
text: Love the option to just walk in and grab a pizza or two without a wait!

name: Jeffrey Deloach
text: It's a great place to get food fast

name: Nick Will
text: Never have to wait on a pizza.. very quick

name: Racheal Coleman
text: Average pizza for a decent price. Great for feeding a crowd or kids.

name: michael pennington
text: We went in tonight and got two pizzas and they tasted like they sat all day long. One of the worst pizzas I have ever gotten will never go back..

name: DR. Filthyfrank2
text: Was told they were waiting to close until I got my pizza and they closed the cash registers and threw away my pizzas can't rate 0 stars and I think these teens should be fired.

name: State Of Kansass
text: Always fast and friendly staff!

name: Darla Barnhart
text: As far as I know there is only one location in town and it is not very convenient.

name: Rachel Duncan
text: I like the ultimate pizza and the cinnabons.

name: adam Morstorf
text: Always have hot and ready

name: Jason Stafford
text: At $6 for a large pizza that you don't have to wait for, expectations really can't be all that high, but if you want good carry out pizza, just about anything is probably better... with a wait.

name: aimee glase
